changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists fact_inventory_snapshot ( id bigserial not null,
account_id bigint not null, source_platform text not null,
snapshot_date date not null,
source_product_id text not null,
warehouse_id bigint not null,
quantity_total integer, quantity_available integer, quantity_reserved integer, quantity_in_way_to_client integer, quantity_in_way_from_client integer, quantity_return_to_seller integer, quantity_return_from_customer integer,
created_at timestamptz not null default now(), updated_at timestamptz not null default now(),
constraint pk_fact_inventory_snapshot primary key (id),
constraint uq_fact_inventory_snapshot_nk unique ( account_id, source_platform, snapshot_date, source_product_id, warehouse_id ),
constraint fk_fact_inventory_snapshot_dim_warehouse foreign key (warehouse_id) references dim_warehouse (id) );
